metadata.title: CVE-2016-3826 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: services/audioflinger/Effects.cpp in mediaserver in Android 4.x before4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, and 6.x before 2016-08-01does not validate the reply size for an AudioFlinger effect command, whichallows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka internalbug 29251553.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
